stories.text:
My name is Mark Amberg, Co-founder of Craspa, restaurant tech. I was watching an interview with Mr.Beast speaking on the success of content creators and he mention that a lot of successful content creators have 1 thing in common which is collaboration. However, to my knowledge, there aren't many places, for founders to group meet or find other founders that aren't well established. This is why I want to start a founders group of around 8 founders in the B2B space to collaborate with and grow.

If you or know someone interested in weekly/bi-weekly zoom group meetings, focusing on growth, accountability, bouncing ideas/tactics, and overall growth together, please drop your company's website and I'll check it out and reach out to you.

Must be no funding to no more than series A funding and have a working and market-ready product.
stories.title: Looking to build a group of like-minded founders for mutual success
